Create network widget

Source: R/utils-links.R
create_network_widget.Rd

Network is populated via a proxy. This function initialises an empty network with the right setup.

Usage

create_network_widget(
  init_nodes = data.frame(),
  init_edges = data.frame(),
  ns,
  height = "100vh",
  width = "100%",
  interactions = default_network_interactions(),
  options = default_network_options(),
  edges = default_edges_options(),
  physics = default_network_physics(),
  events = default_network_events(ns)
)

Arguments

init_nodes

Initial set of nodes.

init_edges

Initial set of edges.

ns

Namespace.

height

Network height.

width

Network width.

interactions

See default_network_interactions.

options

See default_network_options.

edges

See default_edges_options.

physics

See default_network_physics.

events

See default_network_events.

Value

A visNetwork object.
